bridge-type.label: KNX serial gateway
bridge-type.description: This Bridge is for the serial KNX gateway running on the openHAB host

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port to use for connecting to the KNX bus

parameter.name: readingPause
parameter.label: Reading Pause
parameter.description: Time in milliseconds of how long should be paused between two read requests to the bus during initialization

parameter.name: responseTimeout
parameter.label: Response Timeout
parameter.description: Seconds to wait for a response from the KNX bus

parameter.name: readRetriesLimit
parameter.label: Read Retries Limit
parameter.description: Limits the read retries while initialization from the KNX bus

parameter.name: autoReconnectPeriod
parameter.label: Auto Reconnect Period
parameter.description: Seconds between connect retries when KNX link has been lost, 0 means never retry

parameter.name: enableDiscovery
parameter.label: Enable Discovery
parameter.description: Enable or disable automatic Individual Address discovery

parameter.name: knxProj
parameter.label: KNX Project File
parameter.description: KNX Project File (knxproj) to parse and add to the Things managed by this Bridge
